moving to Java Core for first investigations

We call IFolder.delete(...) with the force flag set to false. The resource 
exception contains the following CVS status:
Status ERRORorg.eclipse.team.cvs.core code=-18 Folder '/Test/src/x/y' was not 
deleted in order to properly communicate file deletions to CVS null

So CVS is preventing the deletion. Moving to Platform/VCM.
Note you can reproduce the problem in the Navigator as well.

This was intended behavior based on the need of CVS to keep folders around to 
communicate outgoing deletions to the server. The generation of the exception 
has been removed until this issue can be properly addressed. The folders will 
remain around until the outgoing deletions are committed.
